data.text: @WashingtonSRC Glad I attended the zoom meetings and wrote in against vaccine mandate for school kids. Great job everyone! https://t.co/lmhLCHVLcG
@WashingtonSRC This is fabulous news. Next up, we need an administrative petition that prohibits the use or ANY experimental products in children, elderly, disabled or other vulnerable demographics.
@RootOutAbleism @WashingtonSRC I'm about to start attending school board meetings!!
@WashingtonSRC I live in Whatcom County. I've followed the "numbers" for 2 years.  There have been ZERO deaths from age 0 to 20 here.  Vaccine requirements for this age are ridiculous.
